text: @RobertJenrick He put others at risk - the paramedics who took his child & contagious wife to hospital in Durham & the NHS staff during overnight stay! Child was ok but probably only ill after being cooped up in car for 5 hrs with 2 contagious parents. They took Covid19 from London to Durham !!
